Class GamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • Screen
          • GamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GamePanel
extends Screen
    The GamePanel class is the driver class for the card game.

    GamePanel

    Date: 2016/05/24

    Version:
    1 2016/05/24
    Author:
    David White and Sepehr Hosseini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GamePanel(TerrarithmeticApp frame)
      This constructor is used as a driver class for the card game, which creates a new Board that the game will be played on, and add MouseListener to the class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GamePanel

        public GamePanel(TerrarithmeticApp frame)
        This constructor is used as a driver class for the card game, which creates a new Board that the game will be played on, and add MouseListener to the class.
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame that the GamePanel will be displayed on.

      • refresh

        public void refresh(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method serves as a drawing component for the GamePanel class and refreshes the screen.

        Local variables:

        g2D Reference to the Graphics2D class which will be used to draw images onto the screen.

        refresh in class Screen
        Parameters:
